description:
Lag gets a fever. Sylvette and Niche are worried and try nursing him back to health, but Niche isn`t used to it and makes mistake after mistake.  And whether it`s on an errand or shopping she keeps getting distracted as well. Sylvette takes care of them one after another, but Niche dislikes how Sylvette is always nagging her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Sick Letter Bee and the Girls
Byoki no Tegami Bachi to Shojo-tachi
病気のテガミバチと少女たち
